name: asset-tracking-backend
description: Asset Tracking Backend Service: A robust and scalable Node.js server providing RESTful API services for asset management, including authentication, data storage, notifications, and integration with external services like Google APIs.

scripts.bundle: mkdir deploy && cp -r app server.js package.json package-lock.json asset-t1-backend.service .env deploy
scripts.winbundle: md deploy && xcopy app server.js package.json package-lock.json asset-t1-backend.service .env deploy /s /e /i /h /y

author: Team 1
